text: Richard Schaal (; May 7, 1928 – November 4, 2014) was an American movie and television actor from Chicago, Illinois. He was married to actress Valerie Harper from 1964 to 1978. His daughter is actress Wendy Schaal by his first marriage to Lois (née Treacy).Northern Exposure: reoccuring characters In 1962, he joined Chicago's Second City. He became skilled in sketch and improvisational comedy. He had a recurring role in Just Our Luck. He was featured in several episodes of The Mary Tyler Moore Show, The Bob Newhart Show, Rhoda and Phyllis. Schaal died on November 4, 2014, in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California. He was 86.Richard Schaal dies at 86; character actor was a Second City pioneer == Same movies == * The Russians Are Coming, the Russians Are Coming (1966) * The Cube (1969) * Slaughterhouse-Five (1972) * The Hollywood Knights (1980) * Once Bitten (1985) == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Television personalities from Chicago
title: Richard Schaal
